original_title: มายวาเลนไทน์ แล้วรัก...ก็หมุนรอบตัวเรา
overview: When destiny brings three men to a girl called Mind, she finds that they all have different personalities which she likes equally. She has to decide by herself. Or get her friends, her parents or even let fate decide. For this coming Valentine's Day who will she choose.
tagline: A chance of… a perfect choice.
title: My Valentine
